name: mcp-server-feature-reference
description: Feature Reference MCP Server - Examples for Embedded and External OAuth

scripts.build:external: npm run build --workspace=external-oauth/auth-server && npm run build --workspace=external-oauth/mcp-server
scripts.test:external: npm run test --workspace=external-oauth/auth-server && npm run test --workspace=external-oauth/mcp-server
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:embedded && npm run test:e2e:external
scripts.lint:external: npm run lint --workspace=external-oauth/auth-server && npm run lint --workspace=external-oauth/mcp-server
scripts.typecheck:external: npm run typecheck --workspace=external-oauth/auth-server && npm run typecheck --workspace=external-oauth/mcp-server
